meanings.definition: A physical attack or threat of attack.
meanings.sent1: The assault left him with bruises and a broken arm.
meanings.sent2: The news reported an assault in the park last night.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful assault on the yarn ball was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The assault of the storm on the coastline was fierce and relentless.
meanings.sent5: The assault on the castle was depicted in vivid detail in the historical novel.

meanings.sent1: The sudden assault caught everyone by surprise.

meanings.sent3: The assault of giggles erupted during the serious meeting.
meanings.sent4: The assault of colors in the painting was striking and bold.
meanings.sent5: The assault on the senses at the busy market was overwhelming.
